issue.title: [CF 509] [MoP] Priest Shadow Orbs
issue.body:
Could you add the Shadow Orb resource for shadow priests?

~The max is 3.


> Posted by CurseForge user JStrese | Imported from CurseForge issue #509 | Raw

comments.body:
I managed to get it working with this~

``` { -- shadow orbs text = SHADOW_ORBS, value = "SHADOW_ORBS", category = L["CNDTCAT_RESOURCES"], min = 0, max = 3, unit = PLAYER, icon = "Interface\\Icons\\Spell_Priest_Shadoworbs", tcoords = standardtcoords, funcstr = [[UnitPower(c.Unit, 13) c.Operator c.Level]], events = function(ConditionObj, c) return ConditionObj:GetUnitChangedEventString(c.Unit), ConditionObj:GenerateNormalEventString("UNIT_POWER", c.Unit) end, hidden = pclass ~= "PRIEST", }, ```
Edited Jul 7, 2012
